name: search-with-algolia-bogo-extension
description: Simple extension of Bogo and WP Search with Algolia
author: hidetaka okamoto

scripts.i18n: wp-env run cli wp i18n make-pot . languages/algolia-bogo.pot --domain=algolia-bogo --slug=algolia-bogo
scripts.test: wp-env run cli bash -c 'cd wp-content/plugins/algolia-bogo-extension && vendor/bin/phpunit -c phpunit.xml.dist'
scripts.test:install: wp-env run cli bash -c 'cd wp-content/plugins/algolia-bogo-extension && composer install'
